meanings: to make a long story short

meanings.meaning: as a duck takes to water

vlive.korean: 저희가 이렇게 간단히 팀워크를 맞춰보았는데요 여러분 잘 맞는 것 같나요? We've checked our teamwork. Do you think we've got great teamwork? 듣기 View video OSEN : Golden Child 골든차일드, 그림 실력 대신 눈치(?)로 따낸 회식 #스타로드 05
vlive.english: We've checked our teamwork. Do you think we've got great teamwork?

vlive.korean: [용건만 간단히] 어디야? [Simple] Where are you? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : [SKZ VLOG] 리노 : 리노, 하고 싶은 거 다 하지 마

[쿠키 재료 소개 타임] 그럼 재료를 하나씩 좀 간단히 소개해 볼까요? [Time to introduce the cookie ingredients] Shall we give a brief introduction of each ingredient? 듣기 View video Dispatch : [ⓓxV] “우리칠베이커리 OPEN ②” (태일, 도영, 정우 : NCT 127)
vlive.english: [Time to introduce the cookie ingredients] Shall we give a brief introduction of each ingredient?

vlive.korean: 간단히 앉아서 할 수 있는 게임 없나? Is there any game to play while seated down? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [SEVENTEEN] GOING SEVENTEEN 2019 EP.21 TTT #1 (Camping Ver.)
vlive.english: Is there any game to play while seated down?

vlive.korean: [선풍기 하나로 꽁냥꽁냥] 다니면서 뭐 간단히 마실까? [Looking so sweet with a fan] Shall we drink something? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 두 남자가 한 여자를 좋아한다면?ㅣ[리얼하이로맨스S2] EP9
vlive.english: [Looking so sweet with a fan] Shall we drink something?

examples.korean: The professor previewed the course for us. 발음듣기 교수가 우리에게 그 강좌에 대해 간단히 소개해 주었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The professor previewed the course for us. 발음

examples.korean: You can make a curry hotter simply by adding chillies. 발음듣기 간단히 고추만 더 넣으면 카레를 더 맵게 만들 수 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You can make a curry hotter simply by adding chillies. 발음

examples.korean: She performed a brief mime. 발음듣기 그녀가 간단히 무언극을 해 보였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She performed a brief mime. 발음

examples.korean: Drop me a line when you get there. 발음듣기 거기 도착하면 간단히 적어서 알려 줘. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Drop me a line when you get there. 발음

examples.korean: Simply add hot water and stir. 발음듣기 그냥 간단히 뜨거운 물을 부어 젓기만 하세요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Simply add hot water and stir. 발음
